H0.text: Taking medication daily can drastically reduce the rate of an infectious disease.

H1.text: By preventing transmission between people, the rate of an infectious disease can be drastically reduced.

H2.text: By wearing clean clothing daily, the rate of an infectious disease can be drastically reduced.

H3.text: Performing dental hygiene three times each day can drastically reduce the rate of an infectious disease.

A4.text: Infection rates can be drastically reduced if the main focus is on the prevention of transmission jumps between hubs.

A5.text: Groups may undergo quarantine, or in the case of communities, a cordon sanitaire may be imposed to prevent infection from spreading beyond the community.
